name: Étude for Rocks and Trees
description:
Étude for Rocks and Trees was created for ProcJam, a week long game jam focused on procedural generation

The goal of the piece was to explore randomly generating a 3D music space in VR which the player can explore, altering the soundscape as they traverse the park.

Étude for Rocks and Trees is best experienced using a VR headset and headphones.

---

Matt Mirrorfish, the creator of the piece, is a game designer and musician based in Brooklyn New York. Learn more at http://www.mirrorfishmedia.com or follow @mattmirrorfish on Twitter.
